title: Blanket, "Sampler Blanket #4", 2004
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark green background with a pink band at the top.  On the left side, vase and flower forms in light green, oriented sideways.  On the right, "xx" shapes reminiscent of cross-stitch embroidery, a butterfly and a bird in patterned bright blue.  The bottom third features a light blue patterned sunburst.  A large embroidered butterfly in the bottom third of the textile.
